capability.name: Merchant Relations
capability.definition: This service domain maintains the terms and conditions agreed with merchants for cards related activity
capability.role: The bank's merchant relationships are governed by the terms and conditions maintained by this service domain. Note this covers the application of legal, regulatory and operational terms agreed with the merchant and does not cover any more general aspect of relationship management
capability.example: A card charge is disputed and a case raised - the case processing process references the in-force merchant terms and conditions governing the dispute resolution

key_features.name: Establish and maintain merchant terms and conditions
key_features.description: Enables establish and maintain merchant terms and conditions to support this service domain maintains the terms and conditions agreed with merchants for cards related activity

key_features.name: Determine the applicability of terms to specific situations
key_features.description: Enables determine the applicability of terms to specific situations to support this service domain maintains the terms and conditions agreed with merchants for cards related activity

key_features.name: Provide access to and explain the correct interpretation of terms
key_features.description: Enables provide access to and explain the correct interpretation of terms to support this service domain maintains the terms and conditions agreed with merchants for cards related activity
